clui

Class MyFoodora

  • java.lang.Object
    • clui.MyFoodora

  • public class MyFoodora
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the core of the CLUI. Is able to treat inputs from the console or from a text file, parsing them and then processing the command.
    Author:
    Juan Castillo

      MyFoodora()
      MyFoodora constructor, reads the initial setup from serialized core if file exists and gets the list of all commands that the user will later be able to introduce

        Parameters:

        public boolean checkCmdExists(java.lang.String name)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        TRUE, if name is in listCmds, FALSE otherwise
